title: Golden Ratio I Don't Want To Be Far From Love
alternative_title: ไม่อยากจะห่างรัก
status: ไม่อยากจะห่างรัก
description:
Description :
        "Freen Pruttharin," a 28-year-old freelance photographer, falls in love with "Nicha Sisirnich," a 40-year-old associate professor known as the "Ice Witch." However, Associate Professor Nicha has made it clear that she isn't interested in starting a new relationship and has never been swayed by any woman. Yet, fate gradually brings the two closer, sparking a feeling of wanting to experience love again and open their hearts once more.
